item.title: Crowder - All My Hope
item.description:
For educational use. Chords Used: G Am C D7 A7
All My Hope by David Crowder. It’s been lowered by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Rihanna - Stay (Album Version)
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Stay on the ukulele by Rihanna. The chords used are C F G Am Dm.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Parachute - Lonely With Me
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Lonely With Me on the ukulele by Parachute. The chords used are C F G Am.
*Original in the Key of D
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: The Kingston Trio - Where Have All The Flowers Gone? (Remastered)
item.description:
For educational use. Chords Used: C Am F G
"Where Have All the Flowers Gone" by The Kingston Trio. It’s been digitally raised by 2 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. The lyric video by YouTuber jasmine e may be found here (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bI3QVsW30j0), I just added the chords.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Beyoncé - SPIRIT (From Disney's "The Lion King")
item.description:
For educational use. Chords Used: G D Em C B7 Am F
Spirit (from Disney’s The Lion King) by Beyoncé. It’s been raised by 2 semitones and the modulation has been removed so beginner ukulele students can play along. Also, the “quick change” chords have not been included. As for the B7 chord, feel free to do it 432X instead of using the barre.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Lewis Capaldi - Someone You Loved
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C. Transposed down a half step from the original.
Chords Used: C, G, Am, F, Dm
As performed by Lewis Capaldi
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/Y8Wdenl8bD8
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. The motion video is from churchmediadrop.com
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Hillsong أغنية التلال - المحيطات
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Am. Transposed down a whole step from the original.
Chords Used: Am, G, C, F, Dm
As performed by Hillsong United.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE):
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. The motion background is from www.churchmotiongraphics.com.

item.title: Avril Lavigne - Complicated
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G.
Chords Used: G, Em, C, D, Am
As performed by Avril Lavigne.
This video was originally blocked everywhere by the copyright holder. The copyright holder has now allowed this use of the song, so I can make this video available. Recorded in May 2019, published in July 2019.
Tutorial Video (GCEA Chords & Strumming): https://youtu.be/7sP-4H11k0g
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. The motion background is from motionbolt.com.
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff

item.title: Daddy Yankee - Con Calma
item.description:
For educational use. Chords Used: Am G Dm
Con Calma by Daddy Yankee & Snow. It’s been raised by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along.

item.title: The Beach Boys - In My Room
item.description:
For educational use.
Chords Used: C Bb Am Dm G G7
In My Room by The Beach Boys. It’s been raised by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along. The chords have been added to a lyric video that was created by YouTuber rainbow4121 which may be found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-b5WsEDZvsE.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
